an6.114:4.3: Discontent, lack of situational awareness, and having many wishes.
an6.114:4.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.114:4.7: You should develop contentment to give up discontent, situational awareness to give up lack of situational awareness, and having few wishes to give up having many wishes.
an6.114:4.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
